name: Initiate of the Elder Elementals
description: A small humanoid creature representing the elemental forces of nature, showcasing both physical prowess and magic.
memorable: Possesses elemental adaptability and strong spellcasting abilities.
goals: Typically invokes elemental powers in combat, utilizing spells and in coordination with allies.
relations: Often found working alongside elemental beings or evil spellcasters.
environment: Commonly found in areas rich in elemental magic or among evil factions.
strengths: Strong in spellcasting with a diverse array of elemental spells and advantageous traits.
weaknesses: Very low strength makes it vulnerable in melee combat, particularly in direct confrontations.
attacks: Attacks using a dagger for melee or ranged strikes and can unleash potent elemental magic.
most_powerful_ability: Gift of the Elder Elementals allows for substantial damage and hinders targets against future spells.
skills: Skilled in Religion and Intimidation, with a notable proficiency in spellcasting.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage.
Can change the damage type of spells for tactical flexibility.
Gains advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
Has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom checks in bright light.
5th-level spellcaster with a variety of damaging spells.
spellcasting: Can cast various spells including burning hands, lightning bolt, and versatile elemental damage spells.
